name: CUSTOM Slider #7
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt
  assign slider_mt_mobile = section.settings.slider_mt_mobile
  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile

  assign card_padding_bottom = section.settings.card_padding_bottom
  assign card_padding_bottom_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_bottom_mobile
  assign card_padding_top = section.settings.card_padding_top
  assign card_padding_top_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_top_mobile
  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius
  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_shadow = section.settings.card_shadow
  assign card_height = section.settings.card_height

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = section.settings.content_horizontal_align_mobile
  assign content_horizontal_align = section.settings.content_horizontal_align
  assign content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal

  assign text_align = ""
  if content_horizontal_align == "start"
    assign text_align = "left"
  elsif content_horizontal_align == "center"
    assign text_align = "center"
  else
    assign text_align = "right"
  endif

  assign text_align_mobile = ""
  if content_horizontal_align_mobile == "start"
    assign text_align_mobile = "left"
  elsif content_horizontal_align_mobile == "center"
    assign text_align_mobile = "center"
  else
    assign text_align_mobile = "right"
  endif

  assign tag_size = section.settings.tag_size
  assign tag_size_mobile = section.settings.tag_size_mobile
  assign tag_custom = section.settings.tag_custom
  assign tag_font = section.settings.tag_font
  assign tag_height = section.settings.tag_height

  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_mt = section.settings.heading_mt
  assign heading_mt_mobile = section.settings.heading_mt_mobile

  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile

  assign image_mt = section.settings.image_mt
  assign image_mt_mobile = section.settings.image_mt_mobile
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile
  assign image_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.image_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign image_padding_horizontal = section.settings.image_padding_horizontal

  assign pagination_padding_vertical = section.settings.pagination_padding_vertical
  assign pagination_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.pagination_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign pagination_padding_horizontal = section.settings.pagination_padding_horizontal
  assign pagination_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.pagination_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign pagination_radius = section.settings.pagination_radius
  assign pagination_border_thickness = section.settings.pagination_border_thickness
  assign pagination_border_color = section.settings.pagination_border_color
  assign pagination_bg_color = section.settings.pagination_bg_color
  assign pagination_size = section.settings.pagination_size
  assign pagination_size_mobile = section.settings.pagination_size_mobile
  assign pagination_color = section.settings.pagination_color
  assign pagination_custom = section.settings.pagination_custom
  assign pagination_font = section.settings.pagination_font
  assign pagination_height = section.settings.pagination_height
  assign pagination_show_desktop = section.settings.pagination_show_desktop
  assign pagination_show_mobile = section.settings.pagination_show_mobile

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect
  
-%}

{%- style -%}

  {{  tag_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ pagination_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}


  
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .slider-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px;
    overflow: visible !important;
  }

  .slider-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ card_padding_top_mobile }}px 0px {{ card_padding_bottom_mobile }}px 0px;
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px;
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .slider-slide-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    transform: scale(1.02);
  }

  .slider-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: column;
    padding: 0px {{ content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .slider-tag-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ tag_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ tag_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-weight: 700;
  }
  
  .slider-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: {{ heading_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
  }

  .slider-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .slider-text-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;
    text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
  }

  .slider-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .slider-image-{{ section.id }} {
    overflow: hidden;
    margin: 0px {{ image_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    margin-top: {{ image_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .slider-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .slider-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
  }

  .slider-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .slider-navigation-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: end;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 16px;
  }

  .slider-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ pagination_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ pagination_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ pagination_radius }}px;
    backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
    border: {{ pagination_border_thickness }}px solid {{ pagination_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ pagination_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.3 }};
    overflow: hidden;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 5px;
  }

  .slider-pagination-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ pagination_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ pagination_color }};
    line-height: {{ pagination_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .slider-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    align-items: center;
    gap: 16px;
  }

  .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.3 }};
    backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15);
  }

  .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease-in-out;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease-in-out;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
  }

  .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .slider-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px;
    }

    .slider-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ card_padding_top }}px 0px {{ card_padding_bottom }}px 0px;
    }

    .slider-content-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 0px {{ content_padding_horizontal }}px;
      align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .slider-tag-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ text_align }};
      font-size: {{ tag_size }}px;
    }

    .slider-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ heading_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ text_align }};
    }
    
    .slider-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .slider-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ text_align }};
    }
    
    .slider-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .slider-image-{{ section.id }} {
      margin: 0px {{ image_padding_horizontal }}px;
      margin-top: {{ image_mt }}px;
    }

    .slider-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ pagination_padding_vertical }}px {{ pagination_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .slider-pagination-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ pagination_size }}px;
    }

    .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if tag_custom %}
  <style>
    .slider-tag-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ tag_font.family }}, {{ tag_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ tag_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ tag_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .slider-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .slider-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if pagination_custom %}
  <style>
    .slider-pagination-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ pagination_font.family }}, {{ pagination_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ pagination_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ pagination_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if card_shadow %}
  <style>
    .slider-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      box-shadow: 2px 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,.08);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .slider-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .slider-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .slider-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .slider-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if pagination_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .slider-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .slider-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if pagination_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .slider-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .slider-pagination-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .slider-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    .slider-image-{{ section.id }}{
     aspect-ratio: 12/6; 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .slider-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .slider-image-{{ section.id }} {
     aspect-ratio: auto; 
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
     .slider-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
      } 
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .slider-image-{{ section.id }}{
       aspect-ratio: 12/6; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .slider-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .slider-image-{{ section.id }} {
       aspect-ratio: auto; 
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9);
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if card_height %}
  <style>
    .slider-slider-{{ section.id }} .swiper-wrapper {
      align-items: stretch !important;
    }
    
    .slider-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex !important;
      flex-direction: column;
      justify-content: space-between;
      height: auto !important;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% for block in section.blocks %}
  <style>
    .slider-slide-{{ block.id }} {
      background-color: {{ block.settings.card_bg_color }};
      border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.card_border_color }};
    }

    .slider-slide-{{ block.id }} .slider-tag-{{ section.id }} {
      color: {{ block.settings.tag_color }};
    }

    .slider-slide-{{ block.id }} .slider-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      color: {{ block.settings.heading_color }};
    }

    .slider-slide-{{ block.id }} .slider-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};
    }

    .slider-slide-{{ block.id }} .slider-image-{{ section.id }} {
      border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.image_border_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% endfor %}

{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .slider-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .slider-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .slider-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .slider-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .slider-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ slider_gap_mobile }}px;
  } 

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .slider-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .slider-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: {{ slider_gap }}px;
    } 

    .slider-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .slider-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(100% / {{ slider_view }} - ({{ slider_gap }}px * {{ slider_view | minus: 1 }}));
    }
  }
</style>


<div class="section-{{ section.id }} slider-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      <div class="slider-navigation-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="slider-pagination-{{ section.id }}">
          <span class="slider-current-{{ section.id }}">1</span><span>/</span><span>{{ section.blocks.size }}</span>
        </div>
        <div class="slider-buttons-{{ section.id }}">
          <button class="slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
            <span class="animate-icon"></span>
          </button>
          <button class="slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
            <span class="animate-icon"></span>
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div class="slider-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper preview">
        <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            <{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="slider-slide-{{ section.id }} slider-slide-{{ block.id }} swiper-slide">
              
              <div class="slider-content-{{ section.id }}">
                
                {% if block.settings.tag != blank %}
                  <p class="slider-tag-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.tag }}</p>
                {% endif %}
  
                {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
                  <div class="slider-heading-{{ section.id }}">
                    {{ block.settings.heading }}
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
  
                {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                  <div class="slider-text-{{ section.id }}">
                    {{ block.settings.text }}
                  </div>
                {% endif %}

              </div>

              <div class="slider-image-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                  <img src="{{ block.settings.image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>
                {% else %}
                  {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                {% endif %}
                </div>
            </{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initScrollingProducts() {
    document.querySelector(".slider-slider-{{ section.id }}").classList.remove("preview");
    let current = document.querySelector('.slider-current-{{ section.id }}');
    
    const slider = new Swiper(".slider-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      spaceBetween: 20,
      loop: true,
      centeredSlides: true,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.slider-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          speed: 600,
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view_mobile }}
        },
        768: {
          speed: 600,
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view | times: 0.5 | round: 0 }}
        },
        1024: {
          speed: 300,
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view }}
        }
      },
      on: {
        slideChange: function() {
          var currentIndex = this.realIndex;
          currentIndex++;
          current.innerText = currentIndex;
        }
      }
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initScrollingProducts);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initScrollingProducts);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initScrollingProducts);
  }
</script>

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
